summary: In 1925 the young florentine typographer Mario moves to via del Corno to be near his girl-friend Bianca. Here he becomes friends with Maciste, his landlord, and Ugo, anti-fascists both of ... See full summary »
cast: Anna Maria Ferrero|Cosetta Greco|Antonella Lualdi|Marcello Mastroianni|Bruno Berellini|Irene Cefaro|Adolfo Consolini|Giuliano Montaldo|Gabriele Tinti|Eva Vanicek|Wanda Capodaglio|Domenico Maggio|Andrea Petricca|Garibaldo Lucii|Mario Piloni|Ada Colangeli|Giuseppe Angelini|Graziella De Roc|Rolando Sbrocchi|Aldo Collalti|Maria Mannelli|Francesca Uberti|Pasquale Martino|Fosco Cecchi|Paola Maggiorani|Eugenio Velotti|Tina Veltroni
title: Crónica de los pobres amantes
